Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the refund of additional member contributions of certain persons who cease to be members of the age fifty-seven retirement program for certain New York city members
Summary: Provides for the refund of additional member contributions of persons who cease to be members of the age fifty-seven retirement program for certain New York city members because they have become members of the twenty-five year retirement program for EMTs.
LawCode: Amd ยง604-d, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the refund of additional member contributions of certain persons who cease to be members of the age fifty-seven retirement program for certain New York city members
